1.text: Put an oven-safe skillet into the oven and turn the oven to 450 °F (232 °C).

2.text: Pat the pork tenderloin dry and remove silverskin if it's visible.
2.vid: /e/e6/Cook Pork Tenderloin in the Oven Step 2 Version 3.360p.mp4

3.text: Sprinkle the tenderloin with salt and pepper.
3.vid: /6/67/Cook Pork Tenderloin in the Oven Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Rub 1 to 2 tablespoons (6 to 12 g) of spice or seasoning mix over the tenderloin.
4.vid: /0/09/Cook Pork Tenderloin in the Oven Step 4 Version 3.360p.mp4

5.text: Take the pan out of the oven and swirl vegetable oil in the bottom.

6.text: Put the tenderloin in the skillet and roast it for 20 to 25 minutes.
6.vid: /0/0d/Cook Pork Tenderloin in the Oven Step 6 Version 3.360p.mp4

7.text: Remove the pork when it reaches at least 145 °F (63 °C).

8.text: Rest the pork tenderloin for 10 minutes.
8.vid: /6/63/Cook Pork Tenderloin in the Oven Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

9.text: Slice the tenderloin into 1⁄2 inch (1.3 cm) pieces before serving.
9.vid: /d/d5/Cook Pork Tenderloin in the Oven Step 9 Version 3.360p.mp4

10.text: Marinate the tenderloin for 3 hours to get more flavorful meat.

11.text: Brine the pork tenderloin to make the meat more tender.

12.text: Sear the tenderloin if you'd like the meat to have a caramelized crust.
12.vid: /f/f1/Cook Pork Tenderloin in the Oven Step 12 Version 3.360p.mp4

13.text: Flavor the tenderloin with fresh herb butter just before serving.
13.vid: /a/aa/Cook Pork Tenderloin in the Oven Step 13 Version 3.360p.mp4
